updates.title:
Software Update Available
Squidstat User Interface v2.03.24.2025
updates.update-prompt: A new version of the Squidstat User Interface is available.
updates.changelog:
This version includes multiple new features and several bug fixes. A complete list of changes is available to review in the Release Notes section of the More Options menu within the new software.

IMPORTANT: This software update only supports Squidstats with serial numbers above 1100. Do not download this update if you are using any Squidstats with serial numbers below 1100. Instead, please visit our website to access a software version that is compatible for serial numbers below 1100.
updates.website-link-text: This update can also be downloaded from our website.
updates.mandatory-text:
A new version with critical fixes has been released and must
be installed.
Postponing this update will close the SUI.

downloader-menu.downloader-text: Click 'Install' to close the SUI and proceed with the installation.
downloader-menu.mandatory-dl-text:
This update contains critical fixes to the software and must be installed.
Clicking 'Cancel' will close the SUI.
downloader-menu.cancel-text: Are you sure you want to cancel the download?
downloader-menu.cancel-mandatory-text: This update must be installed to run the SUI. Canceling now will close the application
